root.name: Cosmic Osmo and the Worlds Beyond the Mackerel
root.description: Originally released for the MAC, this game got a PC relaunch in 2008StoryYou're an Osmo and explore the galaxy in your spaceship. The planets you encounter are almost as bizarre as the Osmos themselves. There are seven worlds presented for your consideration, each more goofy and peculiar than the last. Cosmic Osmo is a game about exploration and discovery, not winning or challenges.PC System RequirementsOS: Windows XP / Vista / Windows 7 (unofficially supported)Processor: Pentium +Memory: 256MB RAMHard Disk Space: 200+ MB available HD spaceVideo: DirectX 9.0c compatible or betterSound: DirectX 9.0 compatibleDirectXÂ®: DirectX 9.0c or greater
